topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 2.0: Starting and Stopping Services

body.section: Nova compute To stop the Nova comoute service, you would need to run the playbook associated to the service, i.e. ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts nova-stop.yml You would stop nova to stop API requests going to a service, to start a service that died, to restart a service that was in a bad state.

section.title: Logging
section.p: To stop Logging: ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts logging-stop.yml To start Logging: ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts logging-start.yml Please note that the above steps only impact centralized logging. Logrotate is an essential feature (to keep the service log files from filling the disk) and that will not be affected by these.
